posts.post_content:
Not bad condition at all.  Has the typical bends that you see from the Fatima set but really, not even all that many of those and none that break the surface of the card.  Very little wear and the back is clean and damage free.  Great pose too!  Asking $85 delivered....

Also, Would love to trade the Saier straight up for a t204 if anyone had one available....


*** card is now sold ***

Thanks in advance,
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
